LanguageData.HerdMind.label: herd mentality
LanguageData.HerdMind.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I feel unsafe being all alone.
LanguageData.HerdMind.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd.
LanguageData.HerdMind.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, safety in numbers.
LanguageData.HerdMind.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my herd, there's nothing to fear!
LanguageData.CanidMind.label: pack minded
LanguageData.CanidMind.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I wish I had a proper pack.
LanguageData.CanidMind.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small pack.
LanguageData.CanidMind.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, strength in numbers.
LanguageData.CanidMind.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my pack, this is great!
LanguageData.NaturalHunter.label: natural hunter
LanguageData.NaturalHunter.description: This pawn's mind is now instinctively attuned to the methods of hunting.
LanguageData.NaturalHunter.stages.0.label: natural hunter
LanguageData.NaturalHunter.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is now instinctively attuned to the methods of hunting.
LanguageData.ColorationNatural.label: Unusual colors (natural)
LanguageData.ColorationNatural.description: This pawn's coloration has shifted to those not typically seen in the base species.
LanguageData.ColorationNatural.stages.0.label: Unusual colors (natural)
LanguageData.ColorationNatural.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s coloration has shifted to those not typically seen in the base species.
LanguageData.ColorationAlbinism.label: Unusual colors (albinism)
LanguageData.ColorationAlbinism.description: This pawn has lost most of their pigmentation.
LanguageData.ColorationAlbinism.stages.0.label: Unusual colors (albinism)
LanguageData.ColorationAlbinism.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has lost most of their pigmentation.
LanguageData.ColorationMelanism.label: Unusual colors (melanism)
LanguageData.ColorationMelanism.description: This pawn has an excessive amount of melanin, leading to a dark coloration.
LanguageData.ColorationMelanism.stages.0.label: Unusual colors (melanism)
LanguageData.ColorationMelanism.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an excessive amount of melanin, leading to a dark coloration.
LanguageData.ColorationUnnatural.label: Unusual colors (unnatural)
LanguageData.ColorationUnnatural.description: This pawn's coloration has shifted to one not typically seen in nature (except in highly poisonous frogs).
LanguageData.ColorationUnnatural.stages.0.label: Unusual colors (unnatural)
LanguageData.ColorationUnnatural.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s coloration has shifted to one not typically seen in nature (except in highly poisonous frogs).
LanguageData.ColorationPlayerPicked.label: Dermal repigmentation
LanguageData.ColorationPlayerPicked.description: This pawn's coloration has been artifically shifted to a personalised set.
LanguageData.ColorationPlayerPicked.stages.0.label: Dermal repigmentation
LanguageData.ColorationPlayerPicked.stages.0.descript: [PAWN_nameDef]'s coloration has been artifically shifted to a personalised set.
LanguageData.PrimalWish.label: primal wish
LanguageData.PrimalWish.description: This pawn desires a simple life. So simple, some might comment, that it is suited more for an animal than a human. Indeed, this pawn does envy animals, and would rather be one than human.
LanguageData.PrimalWish.stages.0.label: primal wish
LanguageData.PrimalWish.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] desires a simple life. So simple, some might comment, that it is suited more for an animal than a human. Indeed, [PAWN_nameDef] does envy animals, and would rather be one than human.
LanguageData.PrimalWish.stages.0.messageText: Upon becoming a morph, [PAWN_nameDef] has gained a 'primal wish'. [PAWN_pronoun] might want to go even further with their mutations...
LanguageData.Beastmaster.label: beastmaster
LanguageData.Beastmaster.description: This pawn likes the company of animals who were once people, and feels more at ease being around them.
LanguageData.Beastmaster.stages.0.label: beastmaster
LanguageData.Beastmaster.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes the company of animals who were once people, and feels more at ease being around them.
LanguageData.SplitMind.label: split mind
LanguageData.SplitMind.stages.0.label: split mind
LanguageData.EtherState.label: Etherbonded/broken
LanguageData.EtherState.description: This pawn has produced constantly, leaving them numb or happily broken.
LanguageData.EtherState.stages.0.label: Etherbroken
LanguageData.EtherState.stages.0.description: Constant production has caused [PAWN_nameDef] to become numb and submit to their fate.
LanguageData.EtherState.stages.1.label: Etherbonded
LanguageData.EtherState.stages.1.description: Constant production has caused [PAWN_nameDef] to accept change, and for some reason will now enjoy producing.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.label: Sapience limited
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.description: This pawn has had their sapience limited to a certain level.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.0.label: Lizardbrain
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.0.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to feral levels.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.1.label: Chookbrain
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.1.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to mostly feral levels.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.2.label: Cowbrain
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.2.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to almost feral levels.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.3.label: Dogbrain
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.3.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to conflicted levels.
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.4.label: Monkeybrain
LanguageData.SapienceCapped.stages.4.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to mostly sapient levels.
LanguageData.MutagenInfused.label: modified production
LanguageData.MutagenInfused.description: This pawn has taken mutagen-infused medication that modified their mutation's biological outputs.
LanguageData.MutagenInfused.stages.0.label: mutagen infused
LanguageData.MutagenInfused.stages.1.label: mutagen neutralized
LanguageData.MutagenInfused.stages.2.label: dry
LanguageData.AnimalAffinity.label: animal affinity
LanguageData.AnimalAffinity.description: This pawn has a greater apriciation for animals.
LanguageData.AnimalAffinity.stages.0.label: animal affinity
LanguageData.AnimalAffinity.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s new form has given [PAWN_objective] a greater apriciation for what [PAWN_pronoun] now sees as [PAWN_possessive] fellow animals. It doesn't hurt that [PAWN_pronoun] now speaks their (body) language, either.
LanguageData.PlantAffinity.label: plant affinity
LanguageData.PlantAffinity.description: This pawn cares deeply for plants.
LanguageData.PlantAffinity.stages.0.label: plant affinity
LanguageData.PlantAffinity.stages.0.description: Because [PAWN_nameDef]'s new form has brought [PAWN_objective] closer to nature (too close some might say), [PAWN_pronoun] now better understands how plants fit into the circle of life and is much more careful when tending them.
LanguageData.RareMutant.label: rare mutatant
LanguageData.RareMutant.stages.0.label: rare mutatant
LanguageData.Paragon.label: paragon
LanguageData.Paragon.description: This pawn adapts quickly to new mutations, and can sometimes get better, more powerful mutations than normal morphs.
LanguageData.Paragon.stages.0.label: paragon
LanguageData.Paragon.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] adapts quickly to new mutations, and can sometimes get better, more powerful mutations than normal morphs.
LanguageData.Paragon.stages.0.messageText: Some of [PAWN_nameDef]'s mutations seem to be adapting faster and becoming more powerful.
LanguageData.Afflicted.label: afflicted
LanguageData.Afflicted.description: this pawn not only never adapts to new mutations, their mutations sometimes degrade into worse versions.
LanguageData.Afflicted.stages.0.label: afflicted
LanguageData.Afflicted.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] not only never adapts to new mutations, their mutations sometimes degrade into worse versions.
LanguageData.Afflicted.stages.0.messageText: Some of [PAWN_nameDef]'s mutations seem to be degrading into worse forms.
LanguageData.Productive.label: increased production
LanguageData.Productive.description: This pawn's biochemistry has been modified such that their mutations output rate has been increased. This has caused them to become increasingly hungry, so be sure to keep them fed.
LanguageData.Productive.stages.0.label: productive
LanguageData.Productive.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s productive mutations output rate has been increased. This has caused them to become increasingly hungry, so be sure to keep them fed.
LanguageData.Productive.stages.1.label: very productive
LanguageData.Productive.stages.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s production output and caloric intake have been further increased. Take care, as their body may not be able to handle further productive increases.
LanguageData.Productive.stages.2.label: productive bliss
LanguageData.Productive.stages.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s productive mutations have achieved maximum productive output. The constant production has left their body and mind weakened, and they may occasionally fall into a catatonic state as a result.
LanguageData.PantherAspect.label: instictive predator
LanguageData.PantherAspect.description: The blood of a panther runs through this pawn's veins. Their senses are keener, their body more agile, and their claws sharper. They are the perfect predator.
LanguageData.PantherAspect.stages.0.label: instictive predator
LanguageData.PantherAspect.stages.0.description: The blood of a panther runs through [PAWN_nameDef]'s veins. [PAWN_possessive] senses are keener, [PAWN_possessive] body more agile, and [PAWN_possessive] claws sharper. [PAWN_pronoun] is the perfect predator.
LanguageData.MeatLover.label: meat lover
LanguageData.MeatLover.description: This pawn has developed a taste for raw meat, and is less likely to get sick from it.
LanguageData.MeatLover.stages.0.label: meat lover
LanguageData.MeatLover.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a taste for raw meat, and is less likely to get sick from it.
LanguageData.MartenAspect.label: adorable assassin
LanguageData.MartenAspect.description: Martenmorphs are widely known to be agile and intelligent hunters, capable of incredible feats of skill and agility. They are more than capable of taking on opponents several times their size in hand to hand combat.
